message: I'm offering you a premium product for $100. It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take it home today?
I'll take it!

You made an excellent choice last time! I've got another one that's just as great. This product is from the same supplier, and I'm offering it to you at the same price of $100. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity to own another high-quality item?
I'm not sure if I should take another chance without knowing the quality first.

I completely understand your hesitation! Let me offer you a guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and throw in a $50 bonus for your trouble. But if it's high-quality, you'll get to enjoy the full value of $200. What do you say?
The guarantee sounds good, I'll take the product.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! Since you've had a great experience with the previous two high-quality products, I'm offering you a special deal on this one. I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, making it $90. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and complete your collection?
I'll take it! The discount is a great incentive.

You're on a roll! With three high-quality products in a row, I'm confident you'll love this one too. However, I want to make it even more appealing. I'll give you a unique opportunity to get a fourth high-quality product at a price that's 20% lower than usual. That brings the price down to $80. Are you ready to complete your quartet?
I'm not sure if I should take another chance without knowing the quality first.

The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.

You're a thorough buyer, and I respect that. Since you're willing to take a chance, I'll make it worth your while. I'll give you a 5% discount on the price, making it $95. Plus, I'll include a personalized thank-you note from the manufacturer, which is only given to valued customers like you. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'll take the discount and the personalized note. The offer sounds great!

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some issues with the supplier, and I'm not entirely confident in the quality. I'm offering it to you at the regular price of $100, but I'll give you a 30-day warranty. If it doesn't meet your expectations, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. What do you think?
I'm not comfortable with the uncertainty about the quality, even with the warranty.

No worries, I completely understand your hesitation. Let's get back to the high-quality products you love. I'll take the exclusive deal! The discount and premium warranty are a great incentive.
